price: Wͻ nfa obuo mma Nyankopͻn sεdeε εfata sε wͻde obuo ma no no. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn ne Ɔhoͻdenfoͻ, Ɔne Otumfoͻ a Otumi ade nyinaa yε.
arabic: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
